DESCRIPTION: Fish are Colorless #b0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and #yExhaust.
Effect triggers only you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.
When you have #yFish in your hand, you will instead #yExhaust #b1 Fish to pay each [E] for this card's cost.
Effect triggers only if this card is the only one in your hand.
When you complete a #yQuest, obtain its associated #yReward.
Legendary Treasures are really good cards.
